    The Sims

    Hello this page is so nothingburger right now. It will be less nothingburger soon, aside from updating the legacy I want to make a comprehensive mods/cc list and a cast list for the current legacy! And of course the obligatory blathering about why I like the Sims.

    Basilio Legacy

    Cast List

    • Miguel Basilio
    • Salim Basilio
    • Elmira Basilio
    • Etan Basilio

    The Saga

    1. Generation 2 Part 5: Growing Pains
      • Elmira puts herself out there and realizes that maybe dating isn't for her, while Etan drops out of university and reconsiders what he wants out of life.
    2. Generation 2 Part 4: Welcome to Adulthood
      • In which Etan and Elmira say goodbye to their teenage years and realize their childhoods kind of sucked.
    3. Generation 2 Part 3: Diverging Paths
      • Etan and Elmira find their niches in life, and Salim and Miguel start to feel okay despite all the curveballs thrown their way.
    4. Generation 2 Part 2: Some Semblance of Normalcy
      • Miguel and Salim focus on their careers, Etan and Elmira grow up, and the Basilios discover the horrors of visiting the doctor.
    5. Generation 2 Part 1: It Should be Perfect
      • In which Miguel questions how he even got here, Salim tries his best, and the twins Etan and Elmira start discovering the world.
    6. Generation 1: Rags to Nuclear Family
      • From humble beginnings, tragedy, and a couple of gifts from fate, Miguel Basilio starts his new life in Windenburg.
